title: SFDC BA
description:
Position-SFDC BA

Exp- 5-8 Yrs

Location- Pune, Bangalore, Chennai, Hyderabad & Kolkata.

Notice- Immediate to 15 Days




Job Summary

We are seeking a Salesforce Business Analyst with 5+ years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for gathering requirements, analyzing business processes, and delivering high-quality Salesforce solutions that align with organizational goals. You will work closely with stakeholders, developers, and administrators to optimize and enhance Salesforce functionalities for Sales, Service, and other business units.

Key Responsibilities

1. Requirement Gathering & Analysis:

Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into Salesforce requirements.
Conduct workshops, interviews, and surveys to gather functional and non-functional requirements.
Document business processes, workflows, and system integrations.

2. Salesforce Solution Design & Implementation:

Work with technical teams to design, configure, and implement Salesforce solutions.
Create and manage reports, dashboards, and workflows to support business needs.
Assist in developing custom objects, fields, validation rules, and process automation (Flows, Workflow Rules, Process Builder).

3. Stakeholder Communication & Documentation:

Act as a liaison between business teams and technical teams.
Prepare user stories, functional specifications, and requirement documents.
Conduct training sessions and create user manuals to improve adoption.

4. Data Management & Integration:

Ensure data integrity and accuracy within Salesforce through best practices.
Work on data migration and cleansing activities as needed.
Assist with Salesforce integrations (APIs, third-party apps, middleware tools like MuleSoft).

5. Testing & Deployment:

Conduct UAT (User Acceptance Testing) and facilitate feedback collection.
Support deployment and post-implementation troubleshooting.
Identify and resolve system issues, working closely with Salesforce admins and developers.

6. Continuous Improvement & Best Practices:

Stay updated with Salesforce releases and new features.
Propose enhancements to maximize Salesforce ROI.
Support change management and adoption strategies.

Required Skills & Qualifications

5+ years of experience as a Salesforce Business Analyst.
Strong knowledge of Salesforce Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud.
Experience with requirement gathering, user stories, process mapping, and documentation.
Hands-on experience with Flows, Process Builder, Validation Rules, Reports, and Dashboards.
Familiarity with Salesforce data model, objects, and security model.
Experience working with Salesforce integrations (APIs, third-party tools, middleware like MuleSoft, Jitterbit, or Boomi).
Strong problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment.
Salesforce Certified Administrator or Business Analyst (Preferred).

Preferred Qualifications

Experience in industries like healthcare, financial services, telecom, or manufacturing.
Familiarity with CPQ, Field Service Lightning (FSL), or Marketing Cloud.
Experience with JIRA, Confluence, or other Agile tools.
